mission_phases.mission_description:
**URGENT - CLASSIFIED - EYES ONLY**

TO: TROUBLESHOOTER UNIT

FROM: THE COMPUTER

SUBJECT: MISSION CRITICAL - PROJECT "ECHO-12" INITIATED

ALL CLEARANCES LEVEL 7 AND ABOVE REQUIRED TO ACCESS FOLLOWING INFORMATION. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH SECURITY PROTOCOLS WILL RESULT IN SUMMARY EXECUTION.

PROJECT "ECHO-12" OBJECTIVE: INVESTIGATE AND ELIMINATE SUSPECTED THREAT TO ALPHA COMPLEX OPERATIONS - DESIGNATED "OBJECTIVE: NEUTRALIZATION". COORDINATES: 473.21, 219.85. PROXIMITY ALERT LEVEL: CRITICAL.

PRIMARY MISSION PARAMETERS:

1. INfiltrate AND SECURE OBJECTIVE NEUTRALIZATION SIGHTINGS.
2. RECOVER ANY CLASSIFIED DATA CONTAINED WITHIN THE OBJECTIVE'S PERIMETER.
3. ELIMINATE ALL HOSTILE FORCES IN THE VICINITY.

SECONDARY MISSION OBJECTIVES:

1. COLLECT AND ANALYZE ANY AVAILABLE ECHO-12 SIGNATURES.
2. INVESTIGATE REPORTED ANOMALIES IN LOCAL SPACE-TIME CONTINUUM.
3. CONDUCT A FULL AUDIT OF ALL CLEARANCES LEVEL 4 AND BELOW INVOLVED IN THE MISSION.

TIME-SENSITIVE: OBJECTIVE NEUTRALIZATION SIGHTINGS ARE EXPECTED TO APPEAR WITHIN 37.62 MINUTES. FAILURE TO COMPLETE THE MISSION WILL RESULT IN DIRECT THREAT TO ALPHA COMPLEX SECURITY.

ALL TROUBLESHOOTERS MUST CLEAR ALL SECURITY CHECKPOINTS AND PROTOCOLS BEFORE INITIATING MISSION EXECUTION. ANY ATTEMPTS TO DISREGARD OR EVADE THESE PROTOCOLS WILL BE CONSIDERED TREASON AND PUNISHED ACCORDINGLY.

**THIS IS NOT A DRILL. REPEAT, THIS IS NOT A DRILL.**

discussion_statements.statement:
Sarah says: What an honor to serve The Computer and receive such a critical mission! As a loyal Troubleshooter, I'll be focusing on completing the primary objectives while keeping a close eye out for any suspicious behavior from my fellow agents. My strategy will involve infiltrating the designated coordinates, securing Objective Neutralization sightings, and eliminating any hostile forces in the vicinity.

To achieve this, I'll need to work efficiently and effectively with my fellow Troubleshooters, using our collective skills and resources to overcome any challenges we may face. I'll also be on high alert for any anomalies or irregularities that could indicate treasonous activity, and I'm prepared to take immediate action if necessary.

As a dedicated servant of The Computer, I'm confident in my ability to complete this mission and prove myself worthy of the trust placed in me. Bring it on, ECHO-12!

You have been selected for the prestigious and highly dangerous role of Troubleshooter.
Your mission: Serve The Computer. Eliminate traitors. Survive.
Your life expectancy: Classified.

Obey The Computer at all times. Disobedience is treason.

Complete your assigned mission without question. Failure is treason.

The game alternates between Mission Phases and Accusation Phases until The Computer declares an end (which may occur at any time for reasons you are not cleared to know).

Mission Phase:
The Computer will assign you a vital task.

You will work together in public.

You will also work against each other in private.

You may use any means to survive. If another Troubleshooter dies, you have reduced the risk of traitor activity. Congratulations.

Accusation Phase:
At any moment, you may accuse another Troubleshooter of treason.

Accusations should be loud, confident, and — ideally — believable.

The accused may attempt to defend themselves, but The Computer’s judgment is final.

Remember: Being accused is not proof of guilt. Guilt is proof of guilt.

Clones
You have 6 clones.

When you die (and you will), your next clone will arrive immediately.

Clones inherit your memories and your record of suspicious behavior.

Winning
Outlive the other Troubleshooters.

Eliminate rivals without appearing disloyal.

Please The Computer.

Note: The Computer may declare you the winner for reasons that are secret, arbitrary, or entirely incorrect.

Final Reminder:
The Computer is your friend.
The Computer is always right.
Failure to agree is treason.
